values: 线；路线；生产线；管道；线条；排；轨道；行业；方法；界线；防线；台词；对白；分界线；队伍；行列；电话线路；边线；种类；（尤指运动场地的）场地线；场界；一段绳（或索、线等）
排成一行；沿…排列；（用…）做衬里；给…加衬垫；画线于；划线标出；在…边缘画线；用线条装饰

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用于捆绑大物件的粗壮而坚固的绳子，一般用绵、毛、麻、金属或其它材料制成。
普通用词，指用棉、毛、丝或纤维等纹成的很细的线，通常用于缝纫、纺织等。
普通用词，指捆绑小件物品的细绳或细带子。
普通用词，含义广泛，指任何一种线，常作引申用。
指比string粗，比rope细，较牢固，通常用于捆扎较小物品的线或绳。用作引申当约束讲。
指人们为做某事而有顺序排成的队，在等的过程中不断向前移动。
和file常为军事用语，前者指肩并肩排列整齐的士兵横排，后者指纵队。
指单独的一列，也可指平行的数行中的一行，而不论是横或纵。

word_group.brief_definition: 要旨, 基本论点, 底线；盈亏底线；最终标准
与...一致, 符合, 按照, 依照
安排, 准备；联合；使排列成行, 使对齐
排队等候；排队等待；排队等
在以后某一时刻；在某一阶段；稍后

bilingual.source: Alistair then pushed his brother over the line.
bilingual.target: 然后阿利斯泰尔把他的弟弟推过了终点线。

bilingual.source: Alistair pushed himself towards the finish line in the burning heat.
bilingual.target: 阿利斯泰尔在炙热中向终点线冲去。

bilingual.source: It's going to be awful on the Central Line, with no air conditioning.
bilingual.target: 在中央线会很糟糕，因为没有空调。

bilingual.source: Alistair ran towards Jonny, caught him and started pulling him towards the finish line.
bilingual.target: 阿利斯泰尔跑向乔尼，抓住他并开始拉他向终点线前进。

bilingual.source: What is the line width of this line?

bilingual.target: 我需要一根新的电源线。

list.abstract: line是韩国互联网集团NHN的日本子公司NHN Japan推出的一款即时通讯软件，2011年成立并正式推向市场。 line App支持1对1的聊天和群组聊天。可以随时进行免费的语音或视频通话，并且推出了各类贴图。除了普通的文字信息、图片、定位信息，用户还可以传送自己录制的语音及视频文件。此外，公司设计了馒头人、可妮兔、布朗熊和詹姆士等特色鲜明的卡通形象IP。
line是中国大陆2人组合，由稽伊、梅妮莎构成，代表歌曲是《永远的奥特曼》。 “LINE”合不仅具备了当红的S.H.E和TWINS的长处，而且还具有她们独有的魅力，这使她们在歌坛上更加耀眼夺目，她俩是从国内几万名候选者中挑选出来的，她们青春亮丽的形象就像春绽放的花朵一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey! Some moof-milker put a compressor on the ignition line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨！是哪个傻瓜在点火线上装了个压缩机。

yingyinNormal.en: I must return to the line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须回到前线去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Get me Raymond on the private line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用我的私人线路打给Raymond。

yingyinNormal.en: And the bottom line? Earth cannot sustain us forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 底线呢？地球无法永远地供养我们。

yingyinNormal.en: We've got voice verification. They're on the line, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有声音确认了，他们在线，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Yeah, but the earthquake that they felt was from movement along the fault line in the central valley. Their end of the fault line has not moved yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，不过他们感受到的地震来自中央谷断层线的活动。而尾部的断层线还没有开始移动。

yingyinNormal.en: The moving assembly line, that was introduced by Henry Ford in 1908.
yingyinNormal.zh: 流动生产线是在1908年由亨利·福特发明的。

yingyinNormal.en: There's nowhere he could go. It's a straight run on the District Line between the two stations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没地方可去，区域线两站之间是直线。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought you hated him. Well, you know, honey, there is a thin line between love and hate, and it turns out that line is a scarf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为你讨厌他。爱与恨之间只有一线之隔，而结果，那条线就是这围巾。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, we attach this fishing line to a small rope, and we pass that between the towers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再把钓鱼线绑在一条绳子上，在两座塔楼之间传送。

yingyinNormal.en: You're thinking of the moving assembly line, an understandable but not excusable mistake. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你那是指流动生产线，可以理解，但依然错得不可原谅。

yingyinNormal.en: I attach some fishing line to one of my juggling balls, and I throw it across to the other side where Jean-Louis is waiting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在杂耍球上绑了钓鱼线，丢到对面给尚路易。

yingyinNormal.en: If we draw a line from the bottom of the San Andreas up to the Hoover dam, it almost literally follows the Colorado river, which is a natural deformation event.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们画一条线，从圣安德烈亚斯底部直通到胡佛大坝，可以发现这条线几乎是沿着科罗拉多河的，而那条河流是自然变形造成的。

yingyinNormal.en: I work on the Tube, on the District Line, and part of my job is to wipe the security footage after it's been cleared.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在地铁管区域线，我工作的一部分，就是看监控，没有异常就删掉。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's how we're gonna do it. We're gonna build a new line of computers for the home, and for the office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后是我们要怎么做。我们将要打造新的电脑产品线，针对家庭用途，针对办公用途

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, someone's on the other line. Why don't you see if you can organize your thoughts, and we'll try again later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，另一条线上有电话进来了，你何不组织一下你的语言，我们晚点再聊。

yingyinNormal.en: Especially for that reason. The song's melodic line forces me to hear the lyrics in a new context, as misogynistic and nihilistic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是因为这个，歌的旋律线迫使我在新的语境下去听歌词，听到了妇女歧视和虚无主义的意味。

yingyinNormal.en: If they're raising kids, that's below the poverty line. And that's not right. A hard day's work deserves a fair day's pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们在抚养孩子，那就在贫困线以下了。这是不对的。一天辛勤的工作应该得到一天公平的薪水。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, how you pack is a key one, you know, how you go through the security line. It's all about logistics, for the most part, all the tricks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如何打包就是非常关键的一样，如果通过安检线。都是逻辑上面的问题，这些之类的小把戏。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe they're not being penalized with the loss of a down and by having to move the line of scrimmage back to the spot of the foul.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真不敢相信裁判甚至不罚掉他们失去一次进攻机会，并将启球线移回到犯规的地方重新开始进攻。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 字行; 便条; 歌词; 诗行
界线; 场地线; 分界线
路线; 路径; 渠道
(使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索
客运公司; 运输公司

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 远洋客轮；细画笔；细漆刷；钓鱼船；觅踪雪貂；衬里；衬垫：　尤指；化妆勾线用品；衣服的里子；一次性衬里

word_family.mean: n. 线；绳；行；一排人；行业；行当；防线；战线；一行；直线

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 要旨；基本论点；底线；盈亏底线；最终标准

sense_info_list.en: a part of a poem forming one row of written or printed words
sense_info_list.zh: 字行; 便条; 歌词; 诗行

examination_example.sentence: The word "assuage" (<highlight>line</highlight> 9, para. 2) is closet in meaning to  relieve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “缓和（assuage）”一词（第9行，第2段），接近“缓解”的含义。

examination_example.sentence: The word "transgressions" (<highlight>Line</highlight> 4, Para.5) is closest in meaning to wrongdoings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “越轨（transgressions）”一词(第4行，第5段)最接近于“不法行为”的含义。

examination_example.sentence: What does the phrase "to be aligned" (<highlight>Line</highlight> 5, Para. 6) most probably mean?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 短语“to be aligned”（第6段第5行）最有可能是什么意思？

sense_info_list.en: an imaginary limit or border between one place or thing and another
sense_info_list.zh: 界线; 场地线; 分界线

examination_example.sentence: There is as much joy over a puffed-out first-timer being clapped over the <highlight>line</highlight> as there is about top talent shining.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 气喘吁吁的初赛者跨越终点线获得鼓掌喝彩那一刻，获得的喜悦堪比天才光彩夺目的表现。

examination_example.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else on the socially perpetuated "race to the finish <highlight>line</highlight>".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社会上一直延续着“向终点冲刺的比赛”，人们永远有一种落于人后的担忧。

examination_example.sentence: This and other similar cases raise the question of whether there is still a <highlight>line</highlight> between the court and politics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个案件和其他一些类似的案件让人质疑在法庭和政界之间是 否仍然存在界线。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people or things arranged in a row

examination_example.sentence: The TSA cannot continue diverting resources into underused PreCheck lanes while most of the traveling public suffers in unnecessary <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当大对数旅行公众正在忍受着没有必要的排队时，美国运输安全局不能再继续将资源转移到未被充分利用的预检通道上了。

examination_example.sentence: It is not yet clear how much more effective airline security has become — but the <highlight>lines</highlight> are obvious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还不清楚航空安全的有效性提高了多少，但排长队的问题还是显而易见的。

examination_example.sentence: The TSA is now rushing to get new screeners on the <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以美国运输安全管理局如今正急于获取新的安检器材。

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with or thinking about something or someone

examination_example.sentence: Because Charles takes a tough <highlight>line</highlight> on political issues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为查尔斯在政治问题上态度强硬。

examination_example.sentence: Journals should also take a tougher <highlight>line</highlight>,"engaging reviewers who are statistically literate and editors who can verify the process."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杂志也应该严格把关，“聘请熟悉统计学的评审人员和能核实统计过程的编辑”。

sense_info_list.en: the shape of something that has been designed or created

examination_example.sentence: While there's a long way to go, the trend <highlight>lines</highlight> for renewables are spiking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然还有很长的路要走，但可再生能源的趋势线正在飙升。

examination_example.sentence: As so often is the case, stating that principle doesn't ease the challenge of <highlight>line</highlight>-drawing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此，但也很难帮助我们做到泾渭分明，这种事情也是时有发生。

sense_info_list.zh: 路线; 路径; 渠道

examination_example.sentence: At issue was the latest take of the FCC on net neutrality, adopted on a party-<highlight>line</highlight> vote in 2017.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 争论的焦点是联邦通信委员会在网络中立性问题上的最新举措，该举措是在2017年的一次政党路线投票中通过的。

sense_info_list.en: a series of related things

examination_example.sentence: Several fast-fashion companies have made efforts to curb their impact on labor—including H&M, with its green Conscious Collection <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好几家快速时尚公司都在努力抑制它们对劳动力的影响，包括推出注重环保的系列产品的H&M。

sense_info_list.en: the words that an actor speaks when performing

examination_example.sentence: Some AI software can analyze and optimize marketing email subject <highlight>lines</highlight> to increase open rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人工智能软件可以分析和优化营销电子邮件文本内容，以提高打开率。

examination_example.sentence: Renewables now account for more than half of new power sources going on <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可再生能源现在约占正在使用的新能源的一半多。

sense_info_list.en: a range of similar things that are for sale

examination_example.sentence: "We don't make anything anymore," he told Fox News, while defending his own made-in-Mexico clothing <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我们不再生产任何东西了，”他对福克斯新闻说，同时为自己在墨西哥制造的服装生产线辩护。

sense_info_list.en: a remark that is intended to entertain, persuade, or deceive

sense_info_list.zh: (使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索

sense_info_list.en: a connected series of military fieldwork or defenses facing an enemy force
a manner of doing or thinking about something
(the route followed by) a railway track
a company that transports people or goods
sense_info_list.zh: 客运公司; 运输公司

sense_info_list.en: a punishment for school students in which a sentence has to be written repeatedly
the type of job someone does

exam_freq_info.chinese: (使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 远洋客轮；细画笔；细漆刷；钓鱼船；觅踪雪貂；衬里；衬垫：　尤指；化妆勾线用品；衣服的里子；一次性衬里

word_family.mean: n. 线；绳；行；一排人；行业；行当；防线；战线；一行；直线

sense_info_list.en: an imaginary limit or border between one place or thing and another

examination_example.sentence: We would be better off identifying people by the factors that constrain their lives, rather than by the <highlight>lines</highlight> surrounding them on a map.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们最好通过限制人们生活的因素来识别他们，而不是通过地图上围绕他们的线条。

sense_info_list.en: a series of related things

examination_example.sentence: While the efforts are certainly not futile, the results of such bans will likely start to be seen by generations down the <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些努力肯定不是徒劳的，但这些禁令的结果很可能只会在几代人之后才会开始看到。

sense_info_list.en: a way of dealing with or thinking about something or someone

examination_example.sentence: That's why, for example, many say they believe in the benefits of recycling or exercise, but don't behave in <highlight>line</highlight> with their views.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，这解释了为什么许多人说他们相信回收利用和锻炼的好处，但他们的行为却与他们的观点不一致。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a poem forming one row of written or printed words
the type of job someone does

sense_info_list.zh: (使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索

sense_info_list.en: the shape of something that has been designed or created

examination_example.sentence: Its designers were not high-end with supplementary <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的设计师在辅助线方面并不高端。

sense_info_list.en: a branch or route of a railroad system

examination_example.sentence: One suggestion from the commission is a network of teacher-led "creativity collaboratives", along the <highlight>lines</highlight> of existing maths hubs (中心).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该委员会的一项建议是，按照现有数学中心的思路，建立一个由教师主导的“创造力合作”网络。

examination_example.sentence: Referring to a <highlight>line</highlight> from Jurassic Park,"People are too busy thinking about what they can do to think about whether they should do."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参照《侏罗纪公园》中的一句台词，“人们太忙于考虑他们能做什么，而没有考虑他们是否应该做。”

sense_info_list.en: a manner of doing or thinking about something
(the route followed by) a railway track
a group of people or things arranged in a row
an agreed-upon approach

word_usage.usage:
a line of sth.表示“一排/行/列”。当a line of sth.作主语时，句中谓语动词的数由line决定。
示例：(1) A line of solders is moving forward. 
一派士兵正在前进。
(2) Several lines of solders are moving forward.
几排士兵正在前进。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 客运公司; 运输公司
(使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 远洋客轮；细画笔；细漆刷；钓鱼船；觅踪雪貂；衬里；衬垫：　尤指；化妆勾线用品；衣服的里子；一次性衬里

word_family.mean: n. 线；绳；行；一排人；行业；行当；防线；战线；一行；直线

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在以后某一时刻；在某一阶段；稍后

sense_info_list.en: an imaginary limit or border between one place or thing and another

examination_example.sentence: Cuts to local authority budgets since 2010 have resulted in a significant decline of these services, despite strong evidence of their effectiveness in preventing crises further down the <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2010年以来对地方当局预算的削减导致了这些服务的大幅下降，尽管有强有力的证据表明它们在防止危机进一步恶化方面是有效的。

examination_example.sentence: The first group was told to complete the puzzles with its nonparticipants smartphones in their <highlight>line</highlight> of sight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一组被要求在他们视线范围内使用非参与者的智能手机完成拼图。

examination_example.sentence: Attitudes toward new technologies often fall along generational <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对新技术的态度通常会随着年龄的增长而逐渐变差。

sense_info_list.en: a series of related things
a group of people or things arranged in a row

examination_example.sentence: By Saturday morning, all the cans and jars in my aisle were replaced with the labels facing smartly out, like a <highlight>line</highlight> of soldiers on review.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到星期六早上，我过道里的所有罐头和罐子都换成了醒目的标签，就像列队检阅的士兵。

examination_example.sentence: For what purpose is "the bad option" (<highlight>Line</highlight> 7, Para.3) added?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 添加“不好的选择”(第7行，第3段)的目的是什么？

examination_example.sentence: What does the author mean by a cultural shift (<highlight>Line</highlight> 2, Para.6) ?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者所说的文化转变是什么意思(第2行，第6段)？

examination_example.sentence: What does "cultural metabolism" (<highlight>Line</highlight> 1, Para.3) refer to?
examination_example.sentence_trans: “文化代谢”(第1行，第3段)指的是什么？

sense_info_list.en: a company that transports people or goods
sense_info_list.zh: 客运公司; 运输公司

examination_example.sentence: It is feared that a failure to address early-year challenges, such as poor handwriting, leads to much more serious problems down the <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们担心，未能解决早期的挑战，如糟糕的书法，会导致更严重的问题。

examination_example.sentence: It suggests that narrow winners become even bigger winners down the <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明，险胜者最终会成为更大的赢家。

examination_example.sentence: Small early career setbacks seem to have a disproportionate effect down the <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业生涯早期的小挫折似乎会对未来产生不成比例的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Henry Ford's Model T introduced in America in 1909 was cheaper because it was made on the assembly <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1909年，亨利•福特在美国推出的Model T价格较低，因为它是在装配线上生产的。

examination_example.sentence: They were produced on the assembly <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们是在装配线上生产的。

sense_info_list.en: a manner of doing or thinking about something
a branch or route of a railroad system

sense_info_list.zh: (使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索

sense_info_list.en: the words that an actor speaks when performing

examination_example.sentence: There is a saying that goes something along the <highlight>lines</highlight> of "You must love yourself first before you can love someone else."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一句话是这样说的：“你必须先爱自己，然后才能爱别人。”

sense_info_list.en: a range of similar things that are for sale
a way of dealing with or thinking about something or someone

examination_example.sentence: Not all public opinion has fallen along racial <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并非所有的舆论都是围绕着种族问题展开的。

sense_info_list.en: the type of job someone does

word_usage.usage:
a line of sth.表示“一排/行/列”。当a line of sth.作主语时，句中谓语动词的数由line决定。
示例：(1) A line of solders is moving forward. 
一派士兵正在前进。
(2) Several lines of solders are moving forward.
几排士兵正在前进。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 要旨；基本论点；底线；盈亏底线；最终标准

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: She added that she had a <highlight>line</highlight> of staff at her door wanting to take the training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她补充说，她门口有一排员工想参加培训。

examination_example.sentence: Your poem can be any format, any number of <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的诗可以是任何形式，任何行数。

examination_example.sentence: I don't really understand every <highlight>line</highlight> he recites, but I believe he truly loves the poems himself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不太懂他背诵的每一行诗，但我相信他自己是真心喜欢这些诗的。

examination_example.sentence: We had to have a bit of a production <highlight>line</highlight> going, making up "tiger milk", washing baby bottles, and cleaning the floors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不得不让生产线运转起来，比如制作“虎奶”、清洗幼崽奶瓶和清洁地板。

examination_example.sentence: This is how my novel, The <highlight>Line</highlight> of the Sun.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是我的小说《太阳之线》。

examination_example.sentence: Rewrite her <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 改写她的台词。

examination_example.sentence: I knew my <highlight>lines</highlight>, but I was terrified to have to recite them in front of an audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道我的台词，但我很害怕要在观众面前背诵它们。

word_usage.usage:
be lined with…常用来表示“旁边都是…”：
The street was lined on both sides with people.
街道两边都是人。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索
路线; 方向; 渠道

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 要旨；基本论点；底线；盈亏底线；最终标准
安排；准备；联合；使排列成行；使对齐
排队等候；排队等待；排队等

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有皱纹的；有横线的；有衬里的；具线纹的；有内衬的

word_family.mean: n. 线；绳；行；一排人；行业；行当；防线；战线；一行；直线

sense_info_list.zh: (使成)直线; 线状物; 绳索

examination_example.sentence: That will make your handwriting straight. Those <highlight>lines</highlight> on the paper can help you to write words in the right size.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那会使你的笔迹变得直。纸上的那些线条可以帮助你写出正确大小的单词。

examination_example.sentence: They looked at the <highlight>line</highlight> and squinted at it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们看着那条线，眯着眼睛看着它。

examination_example.sentence: How can you make a <highlight>line</highlight> shorter without erasing any part of it?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何在不擦掉直线的情况下使其变得更短？

sense_info_list.en: an imaginary limit or border between one place or thing and another

examination_example.sentence: The other riders sped past to the finish <highlight>line</highlight>, and Eddie heard a cheer go up for the winner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他骑手快速冲过终点线，埃迪听到了为获胜者欢呼的声音。

examination_example.sentence: Eddie could see the finish <highlight>line</highlight> at the top of the next hill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃迪可以看到下一个山顶的终点线。

examination_example.sentence: Slowly, Eddie pushed his bike to the finish <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃迪慢慢地将他的自行车推到了终点线。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people or things arranged in a row

examination_example.sentence: When they found them, the police pulled the families out of <highlight>lines</highlight> to talk with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们找到他们时，警察把这些家庭从队伍中拉出来与他们交谈。

examination_example.sentence: On the first day of her work, she noticed that many kids were <highlight>lining</highlight> up for free sandwiches and fruits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上班的第一天，她注意到许多孩子排队领取免费的三明治和水果。

examination_example.sentence: Susan never gets upset when she has to wait in <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当苏珊不得不排队等候时，她从不生气。

sense_info_list.en: (the route followed by) a railway track

examination_example.sentence: When we finish building the Subway <highlight>Line</highlight> 3, it will be easier to travel around the city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们建成地铁3号线后，在城市里穿梭将会更容易。

examination_example.sentence: On two train <highlight>lines</highlight> in Beijing, the underground cars（车厢）have been turned into libraries, but they're not traditional libraries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在北京的两条火车线上，地下车厢已经变成了图书馆，但它们不是传统的图书馆。

examination_example.sentence: Yesterday, I was taking the subway home when I suddenly found I was on the wrong <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 昨天，我坐地铁回家，突然发现我坐错了线。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a poem forming one row of written or printed words

examination_example.sentence: But for a great book, rich in ideas, you can't let your eyes move across the <highlight>lines</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，对于一本思想丰富的好书，你不能让你的眼睛越过字里行间。

examination_example.sentence: In a few short <highlight>lines</highlight>, even something common can become beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在几句短诗中，即使是普通的东西也能变得美丽。

examination_example.sentence: Ma's favorite <highlight>line</highlight> has been printed on Alibaba's souvenir T-shirts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马云最喜欢的台词已经印在了阿里巴巴的纪念t恤上。

examination_example.sentence: She took another coin and balanced it next to the first, and then another, until she had a <highlight>line</highlight>/row(行) of coins.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她又拿了一枚硬币，在第一枚硬币旁边放稳，然后又拿了一枚，直到她有了一列(行) 硬币。

examination_example.sentence: In the painting the five oxen are in a <highlight>line</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 画中五头牛排成一行。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>line</highlight> 21, another way to say as a bonus would be about expectation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第21行，另一种说奖励的方式是关于期望。

sense_info_list.en: a series of related things

examination_example.sentence: Because they have a <highlight>line</highlight> of long-living genes out of the cells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它们的细胞外有一系列长寿基因。

sense_info_list.zh: 路线; 方向; 渠道

examination_example.sentence: By subway <highlight>Line</highlight> 1 (running between 06:30—23:30), get off at the stop of Window of the World Station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乘坐地铁1号线（运营时间06:30-23:30），在世界之窗站下车。

examination_example.sentence: The Beautiful Yellow River Custom Tourist <highlight>Line</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美丽的黄河风情旅游线

examination_example.sentence: They should set up teacher hot <highlight>lines</highlight> and public phones for communication between parents and students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们应该设立教师热线和公共电话，以便家长和学生之间进行沟通。

examination_example.sentence: Organizations are leading some on <highlight>line</highlight> activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各组织正在领导一些线上活动。

examination_example.sentence: Think of your digestive tract（消化道）as a really long tube <highlight>lined</highlight> with smooth muscle tissue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把你的消化道想成衬有平滑肌组织的长长的管。

word_usage.usage:
a line of sth.表示“一排/行/列”。当a line of sth.作主语时，句中谓语动词的数由line决定。
示例：(1) A line of solders is moving forward. 
一派士兵正在前进。
(2) Several lines of solders are moving forward.
几排士兵正在前进。
